hero.text1: We develop autonomous drones and smart infrastructure for logistics, surveillance, and education.
hero.text2: From design and manufacturing to autonomous operation, we cover the entire tech chain.
hero.text3: Decision-making and intelligent flight in complex environments. Our engineering flies on its own.

footer.description: Air Hive is a Mexican startup developing autonomous drones, smart stations, and solutions for logistics, security, and education.

home.autonomy_text: We design drones capable of carrying out specific tasks autonomously. We integrate hardware, software, and computer vision so they operate without manual control.
home.innovation_text: We build aerial solutions from Mexico to solve real problems across industries. High-level engineering, developed locally.
home.education_text: We foster education in science and technology through hands-on drone experiences. We bring students closer to the world of robotics, programming, and engineering.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Educational and custom drones for an autonomous future.
products.kit_description: Designed for educational centers, this kit allows students to assemble a drone from scratch, understand how it works, and program it for autonomous missions. Includes exclusive training and tutorials from our team.
products.kit_feature2: Includes GPS, IMU, ESCs, flight controller, frame, propellers and more
products.kit_feature3: Ideal for workshops, engineering courses and educational competitions
products.kit_feature4: Affordable price and direct support from Air Hive
products.custom_description: We build custom drones tailored to our clients' needs: from FPV stunt drones to professional platforms for aerial photography or fully autonomous missions.
products.custom_feature2: High-quality components selected for their use case
products.custom_feature3: Integration of cameras, GPS, LiDAR, and more

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We help you harness the power of drones.

training.title: Learn to fly with safety and confidence
training.short: Hands-on courses to learn how to fly drones.
training.full: We offer hands-on courses to help you learn how to fly drones for recreational or professional use. Gain essential skills and knowledge to fly safely and prevent crashes.

land.title: See your property like never before
land.short: Aerial images and 3D animations for your project.
land.full: We capture high-resolution aerial images and generate 3D animations showing measurements, boundaries, and visual walkthroughs. Ideal for promotion, architecture, land sales, or real estate projects.

events.title: Professional aerial footage for unforgettable moments
events.short: Aerial filming for events of all kinds.
events.full: We capture aerial footage using the right type of drone for each event. Whether it's a social celebration, corporate activity, or sports event, we provide unique perspectives to preserve your most meaningful moments.

batteries.title: Specialized maintenance for smart batteries
batteries.short: Repair and cell balancing for DJI and custom batteries.
batteries.full: We inspect and repair damaged DJI batteries, including cell balancing and diagnosis of common issues. We also work with custom Li-Ion and Li-Po batteries.

registration.title: Stay compliant and fly with peace of mind
registration.short: Official drone registration support in Mexico.
registration.full: We assist in registering your drones with Mexico’s Federal Civil Aviation Agency (AFAC), ensuring your operations follow current regulations.

support.title: Practical solutions for real-world challenges
support.short: Tailored technical support for your drone needs.
support.full: We provide technical guidance on equipment selection, system integration, and problem-solving in drone-related projects. Our support is tailored to each project's specific needs.

about.story_title: Our story begins in the sky
about.story_text: Air Hive was founded in 2025 with a mission to democratize access to aerial autonomy. We believe drones can be transformative tools that empower industries, communities, and technological progress in the world.
about.mission_text: To develop intelligent aerial solutions that enhance safety, efficiency, and education through accessible design and cutting-edge technology.
about.vision_text: To become the leading aerial innovation company in Latin America, bringing autonomy and technology where they’re needed most.
about.team_text_1: Air Hive is built by people passionate about technology, education, and positive impact. Our team combines expertise in engineering, innovation, and entrepreneurship to create solutions that truly take flight.
about.team_text_2: We’re driven by the belief that Mexican talent can lead the new era of aerial autonomy.
about.philosophy_text: We believe in a future where drones don’t just fly—they solve real problems: from protecting communities to inspiring the next generation of engineers.
